mapper.select: select t.TRAN_NO, t.buyer_id, t.PAYMENT_OPTION, t.RECEIVER_NAME, t.RECEIVER_PHONE, t.DEMAILADDR , t.DLVY_REQUEST , t.TRAN_STATUS_CODE , t.ORDER_DATE , t.DLVY_DATE , p.PROD_NO , p.PROD_NAME , p.PROD_DETAIL , p.MANUFACTURE_DAY , p.PRICE , p.IMAGE_FILE , p.REG_DATE , t.TRAN_STATUS_CODE , u.USER_ID , u.USER_NAME , u.PASSWORD , u.ROLE , u.SSN , u.CELL_PHONE , u.ADDR , u.EMAIL , u.REG_DATE user_reg_date, td.DETAIL_NO , td.TYPE_QUANTITY , td.TYPE_PRICE, FROM TRANSACTION t JOIN PRODUCT p ON t.prod_no = p.prod_no JOIN USERS u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id JOIN TRANSACTION_DETAIL td ON t.TRAN_NO = td.TRAN_NO WHERE t.TRAN_NO=#{tranNo}

select t.TRAN_NO, t.buyer_id, t.PAYMENT_OPTION, t.RECEIVER_NAME, t.RECEIVER_PHONE, t.DEMAILADDR , t.DLVY_REQUEST , t.TRAN_STATUS_CODE , t.ORDER_DATE , t.DLVY_DATE , t.TOTAL_PRICE , p.PROD_NO , p.PROD_NAME , p.PROD_DETAIL , p.MANUFACTURE_DAY , p.PRICE , p.IMAGE_FILE , p.REG_DATE , t.TRAN_STATUS_CODE , u.USER_ID , u.USER_NAME , u.PASSWORD , u.ROLE , u.SSN , u.CELL_PHONE , u.ADDR , u.EMAIL , u.REG_DATE user_reg_date, td.DETAIL_NO , td.TYPE_QUANTITY , td.TYPE_PRICE, FROM TRANSACTION t INNER JOIN PRODUCT p ON t.prod_no = p.prod_no INNER JOIN USERS u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN TRANSACTION_DETAIL td ON t.TRAN_NO = td.TRAN_NO WHERE t.PROD_NO=#{prodNo}

SELECT inner_table.*, COUNT(*) OVER () AS count FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT t.TRAN_NO AS tran_no, t.PROD_NO AS prod_no, t.BUYER_ID AS buyer_id, t.PAYMENT_OPTION AS payment_option, t.RECEIVER_NAME AS receiver_name, t.RECEIVER_PHONE AS receiver_phone, t.DEMAILADDR AS dlvy_addr, t.DLVY_REQUEST AS dlvy_request, t.TRAN_STATUS_CODE AS tran_status_code, t.ORDER_DATE AS order_date, t.DLVY_DATE AS dlvy_date, t.TOTAL_PRICE AS total_price, p.PROD_NAME AS prod_name, p.PROD_DETAIL AS prod_detail, p.MANUFACTURE_DAY AS manufacture_day, p.PRICE AS price, p.IMAGE_FILE AS image_file, p.REG_DATE AS reg_date, u.USER_ID AS user_id, u.USER_NAME AS user_name, u.PASSWORD AS password, u.ROLE AS role, u.SSN AS ssn, u.CELL_PHONE AS cell_phone, u.ADDR AS addr, u.EMAIL AS email, u.REG_DATE AS user_reg_date, td.DETAIL_NO AS detail_no, td.TYPE_QUANTITY AS quantity, td.TYPE_PRICE AS type_price FROM TRANSACTION t INNER JOIN PRODUCT p ON t.PROD_NO = p.PROD_NO INNER JOIN USERS u ON t.BUYER_ID = u.USER_ID INNER JOIN TRANSACTION_DETAIL td ON t.TRAN_NO = td.TRAN_NO WHERE t.BUYER_ID = #{map.user.userId} ORDER BY t.TRAN_NO ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{map.search.endRowNum} ) inner_table WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{map.search.startRowNum} AND #{map.search.endRowNum}
